properties.areaDesc: Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 18 at 9:36AM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Gale Warning, expect sustained winds up to
25 knots from the west with gusts up to 36 knots. The largest
significant waves will be 4 feet with a potential maximum wave
height of 5 feet. During the Low Water Advisory, abnormally
low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to
North Cape MI.

* WHEN...During the Gale Warning, the maximum winds are expected
around 11 PM EST Saturday with the largest waves expected
around 4 PM EST Saturday. During the Low Water Advisory, the
maximum winds are expected around 11 PM EST Saturday with the
largest waves expected around 3 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As westerly gales develop late this
afternoon and evening, water levels will drop below the critical
mark for safe navigation.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
